backend/main.mo: Defines an actor that stores interest list entries and adds new ones unless an email/name duplicate is found.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of Oregon flower decorations on the Home page and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, describing each page, component, hook, and config.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Deployment checklist covering route setup, visual checks for Little Sprouts content, flyer loading, and handbook download behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variable definitions using OKLCH colors for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with SiteLayout and seven routes including Little Sprouts.
frontend/src/components/InterestListForm: Form component handling validation and submission of interest list entries to the backend actor.
frontend/src/components/ParentHandbookAc: Accordion component listing handbook sections with titles and short descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering the TopNav and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar using shadcn components with links to all site routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks with no current functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables along with base typography and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static page describing the preschoolâ€™s philosophy, garden-based learning model, language approach, and program leadership.
frontend/src/pages/ContactInterestListPa: Displays the interest list form for the 2027 program and provides basic contact information with email link.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring the Little Sprouts Garden Club overview and initial preschool opening section with visuals and details.
frontend/src/pages/LittleSproutsPage.tsx: Provides detailed information about the Little Sprouts preschool garden club, including program overview, schedule, and activities.
frontend/src/pages/ParentHandbookPage.ts: Shows parent handbook information with a downloadable PDF check, accordion sections, and regulatory compliance notice.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramPage.tsx: Renders the Program page with sections describing program details, curriculum, outdoor learning, and inclusion values.
frontend/src/pages/TuitionPage.tsx: Renders the Tuition page showing tuition policies, projected rates, and included services.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, spacing, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata including features, requests, and project configuration.
